newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures end mixed as dlr turns toppy.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures end mixed as dlr turns toppy.

text.p: IMM currency futures finished mixed and could continue to consolidate after the dollar turned toppy in U.S. dealings, traders and analysts said.
"The dollar/mark needs a correction," one trader said. "The question is when."
Good dollar/mark selling kept the September mark contract from re-testing its contract low of $5303 during pit trade. September marks fell to $0.5303, or 1.8910 spot, on GLOBEX.
Traders also said active selling of cash sterling against marks not only weighed on September sterling, but attracted dollar sellers against the cash mark.
